mapper.select: SELECT role_code FROM sys_role r LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.state = 0

SELECT concat(sp.res_code, ':', sp.perm_code) perm_code FROM sys_user_role sur LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.role_id = sur.role_id AND sr.state = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_role_resource srr ON srr.role_id = sr.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission sp ON sp.perm_id = srr.perm_id WHERE sur.user_id = #{userId} AND sp.state = 0
SELECT concat(sp.res_code, ':', sp.perm_code) perm_code FROM sys_permission sp
